detaileddescription.para: BLE end command send application logic
BLE start command send application logic
Size of accelerometer complete payload in bytes with spaces in-between the axis values and NULL terminator
Number of accelerometer axis (x, y & z)
Macro for static temperature offset correction. Self heating, temperature correction factor
Handle to store the main Command processor handle to be used by run-time event driven threads
Boolean representing if BLE needs to be streamed. Validate the repeated start flag
OS thread handle for Application controller to be used by run-time blocking threads

memberdef.name: BLESetupInfo
memberdef.initializer: = { .DeviceName = APP_CONTROLLER_BLE_DEVICE_NAME, .IsMacAddrConfigured = false, .MacAddr = 0UL, .Service = BLE_BCDS_BIDIRECTIONAL_SERVICE, .IsDeviceCharacteristicEnabled = false, .CharacteristicValue = { .ModelNumber = NULL, .Manufacturer = NULL, .SoftwareRevision = NULL }, .DataRxCB = AppControllerBleDataRxCB, .CustomServiceRegistryCB = NULL, }

memberdef.name: WLANSetupInfo
memberdef.initializer: = { .IsEnterprise = false, .IsHostPgmEnabled = false, .SSID = WLAN_SSID, .Username = WLAN_PSK, .Password = WLAN_PSK, .IsStatic = WLAN_STATIC_IP, .IpAddr = WLAN_IP_ADDR, .GwAddr = WLAN_GW_ADDR, .DnsAddr = WLAN_DNS_ADDR, .Mask = WLAN_MASK, }

briefdescription.para: Gives control to the Application controller.

detaileddescription.para: This is a template function where the user can write his custom application.

briefdescription.para: This is the BLE data receive callback function.

detaileddescription.para: Callback function called on data reception over BLE.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to the received data buffer

simplesect.para: Do not perform any heavy processing within this function and return ASAP.

parameterdescription.para: : Buffer in which received data to be stored.

briefdescription.para: This will send start or stop message based on input parameter.

parameterdescription.para: Differentiates start and stop command. APP_CONTROLLER_BLE_START_PAYLOAD for start. APP_CONTROLLER_BLE_END_PAYLOAD for stop.

briefdescription.para: To enable the necessary modules for the application.
Responsible for controlling the UDP Example application control flow.

listitem.para: Check whether the network connection is available
Sends the data to the remote server.
Closes the socket after successful communication.
Wait for APP_CONTROLLER_UDP_TX_DELAY before proceeding to redoing the above steps except the first

briefdescription.para: To setup the necessary modules for the application.
This will validate the WLAN network connectivity.

detaileddescription.para: Currently, upon abrupt disconnection the event from the WiFi chip is not propagated / notified to the application. Until then, we manually validate prior to ever HTTP Rest Client POST/GET cycle to make sure that the possibility of software break is reduced. We check if the IP is valid to validate the same.
If there is no connectivity we will restart the node after 10 seconds.
